channel.title: Newbish Question: Is there a LAN version of MoparScape?
channel.description: I just found this recently, and I was amazed, as most probably were when tumbling upon this site...I wanted to know if MoparScape has LAN capabilities, and if so, perhaps a tutorial on how to set it up... :confused:

item.title: Newbish Question: Is there a LAN version of MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @Sariael Sariael
item.description:
@Sariael wrote:

I’m really looking for an LAN exclusive server…Not for meant for MMORPG fun, but for mainly for exploration and fun…Sorta like Solitaire. Maybe I’ll just look into making my own server, if there isn’t a LAN version around.

Read full topic
item.source: Newbish Question: Is there a LAN version of MoparScape?

item.title: Newbish Question: Is there a LAN version of MoparScape?

item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

or you could also have one computer connected to the internet and also lans…

item.source: Newbish Question: Is there a LAN version of MoparScape?

item.title: Newbish Question: Is there a LAN version of MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @Sariael Sariael
item.description:
@Sariael wrote:

Interesting. I just despise my crappy internet connection, and I want something I can run without using it…Granted, it will be limited, as in number of players, but I don’t mind. I wanted something I can enjoy without all the lag…If you have anymore info, I’d appreciate it. I just stumbled on this site like 2 hours ago, and I’m enthralled…

Read full topic
item.source: Newbish Question: Is there a LAN version of MoparScape?

item.title: Newbish Question: Is there a LAN version of MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

actaully that’s not so newbish… i think it may be possible by setting up a lan connection and port forwarding so all pc’s connected to you can use the ip 127.0.0.1 and get on your server, but im not sure…

Read full topic
